PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1998-01151998-02-030,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  HERITAGE, 
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of the HONOURABLE BARNETT J. DANSON, of Toronto, Ontario, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of Civilization, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, in the place of Alexander Blair Stonechild, whose term has expired.
Attachments
